column2: Got the Stealth Device? Ready to investigate the System again?

Here we are. Wait, don't move. I'm turning the Stealth Device on right now.

Ready! Let's flip to hack and let's go.
The moment of truth!  Okay, go ahead and Unlock that Level 2. Let's hope Faber knew his stuff and this device really works.

Whoa! It worked! We're in. Level 2 at last. I wonder what wonders await us here!

This box looks pretty intriguing. Maybe this is what Saniel didn't want us to see?
Something is super weird here. Let me just get a look inside. aAUUGHHHhhaaauuaAUUGHHH!!!!
Hello! Hello! I can't get back out! Go find help!

What's going on here? Didn't I tell you two â€“ Wait that's Riley's scarf!  What happened to the box? 

This box has been inactive for years. What set it off? I'm afraid the AI's are at it again. Very concerning. 

We've got to rescue Riley from the box! I'm going to need your help for that.
Not up for it right now? We can try again later.
